comments.body: optionl nit: suggest `len(labels) != 0` I _think_ it doesn't make a difference, and it won't hurt either way since you check things before overwriting them below-- but for consistency and on the off chance that a 0-length but not nil map is there...
Yeah, multi-object lookups don't work from this code at all, so that'll be interesting when it becomes a thing.
nit: We use len(string) == 0 instead of == ""
We are in no way consistent with this :)
